mapper.select: SELECT cu.idx AS idx, u.user_id AS user_user_id, u.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, cu.name AS `name`, cu.position AS `position`, cu.company AS company, cu.mobile AS mobile, cu.brief AS brief, cu.type AS `type`, cu.community_name AS community_name, cu.building AS building, cu.room AS room, cg.group_name AS community_group_group_name, cg.user_id as community_group_user_user_id FROM grtu_community_user cu JOIN gr_community_group cg ON cu.group_id = cg.group_id JOIN u_user u ON cu.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cu.status = 1 AND cu.group_id = #{groupId} AND cu.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id AS user_user_id, u.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, cg.user_id AS community_group_user_user_id, cu.name AS name FROM grtu_community_user cu JOIN gr_community_group cg ON cu.group_id = cg.group_id JOIN u_user u ON cu.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cu.idx IN
#{id}

SELECT u.user_id AS user_user_id, u.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, cu.position AS `position`, cu.company AS company, cu.room as room , cu.type, cu.building as building , cg.user_id AS community_group_user_user_id, cu.name AS name FROM grtu_community_user cu JOIN gr_community_group cg ON cu.group_id = cg.group_id JOIN u_user u ON cu.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cu.idx IN
#{id}

SELECT uu.user_id AS user_user_id, uu.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, gcu.NAME AS NAME, gcu.position AS position, gcu.company AS company, gcu.joined_at AS joined_at, gcu.type AS type, gcu.`status` AS STATUS, gcg.user_id AS community_group_user_user_id FROM grtu_community_user gcu LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id = gcu.user_id LEFT JOIN gr_community_group gcg ON gcg.group_id = gcu.group_id WHERE gcu.joined_at = ( SELECT max( joined_at ) FROM grtu_community_user gsu WHERE gcu.user_id = gsu.user_id AND gsu.group_id=#{groupId} ) AND gcu.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY gcu.user_id

SELECT gcu.user_id AS user_user_id, gcu.`name`, gcu.gender, gcu.mobile, gcu.company, gcu.position, gcu.brief, gcu.joined_at, gcu.quited_at, gcu.`status`, gcu.type, gcu.community_name, gcu.building, gcu.room, gcg.user_id AS community_group_user_user_id, gcg.group_name AS community_group_group_name FROM grtu_community_user gcu LEFT JOIN gr_community_group gcg ON gcg.group_id = gcu.group_id WHERE gcu.joined_at = (SELECT max( joined_at ) FROM grtu_community_user gsu WHERE gcu.user_id = gsu.user_id AND gsu.group_id = #{groupId}) AND gcu.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY gcu.user_id

SELECT uu.user_id as user_user_id, gcu.`name`, gcu.gender, gcg.user_id AS community_group_user_user_id, uu.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, gcu.mobile, gcu.company, gcu.position, gcu.community_name, gcu.brief, gcu.type, gcu.building, gcu.room, gcu.`status`, gcu.joined_at, gcu.quited_at FROM grtu_community_user gcu LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id = gcu.user_id LEFT JOIN gr_community_group gcg ON gcg.group_id = gcu.group_id WHERE gcu.user_id = #{userId} AND gcu.group_id =#{groupId} AND gcu.joined_at=(SELECT MAX(joined_at) FROM grtu_community_user WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND user_id = #{userId})

SELECT gcu.user_id AS user_user_id, name, uu.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, gcu.position, gcu.company, gcu.type, gcu.building, gcu.room, gcg.user_id AS community_group_user_user_id
FROM grtu_community_user gcu LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id=gcu.user_id LEFT JOIN gr_community_group gcg ON gcg.group_id = gcu.group_id WHERE gcu.group_id = #{communityGroupDO.groupId} AND gcu.`status` = 1 AND CONCAT( gcu.mobile, gcu.NAME, gcu.position, gcu.company, gcu.brief ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
